Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.objects

Class Unit

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.objects.Unit
public class Unit extends Object
A unit is a superclass that interacts with any enemy to prevent it from reaching the end of the level.
A unit can be created, upgraded, and deleted by the user in order to defend waves of enemies and complete the game.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Constructor Details

    • Unit

      public Unit​(int x, int y, int id, int unitType)
      Creates a new unit with the passed unit type in the set location.
      Parameters:
      x - - Defines the vertical position of the unit from the left of the window in pixels rounded to the nearest tile.
      y - - Defines the horizontal position of the unit from the top of the window in pixels rounded to the nearest tile.
      id - - A unique identifier for this unit, used as the index in the units [Unit] array list.
      unitType - - Defines the type of this unit (e.g. Pomu, Finana, Elira).

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Runs a set of tick methods.
      See Also:
      tickCooldown()

    • addLevel

      public void addLevel()
      Increases the level of this unit and increments their base stats depending on their unit type.

    • isOffCooldown

      public boolean isOffCooldown()
      Returns true if this unit is ready to fire a projectile or blast in a radius.

    • isHasted

      public boolean isHasted()
      Returns true if this unit is currently being hasted by Rosemi.

    • takeHaste

      public void takeHaste()
      Checks if the unit was not recently hasted by Rosemi. If true, then the unit is hasted again for the set duration.

    • resetCooldown

      public void resetCooldown()
      Resets the cooldown of this unit and allows this unit to attack again.
